verses.verse: וַיַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> came up מַלְאַךְ־ <S%H4397><s%> And an angel יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <S%H1537><s%> from Gilgal אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַבֹּכִ֑ים <S%H1066><s%> to Bochim פ וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> and said אַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> I made you to go up אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> מִמִּצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וָאָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> and have brought אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you unto the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> unto your fathers וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> and I said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָפֵ֧ר <S%H6565><s%> break בְּרִיתִ֛י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> I will never

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> you לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תִכְרְת֤וּ <S%H3772><s%> And ye shall make בְרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> no league לְיֽוֹשְׁבֵי֙ <S%H3427><s%> with the inhabitants הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4196><s%> their altars תִּתֹּצ֑וּן <S%H5422><s%> ye shall throw down וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no שְׁמַעְתֶּ֥ם <S%H8085><s%> but ye have not obeyed בְּקֹלִ֖י <S%H6963><s%> my voice מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what זֹּ֥את <S%H2063><s%> have ye עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> why have ye done

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> also אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Wherefore I also said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲגָרֵ֥שׁ <S%H1644><s%> I will not drive them out אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> from before וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become לָכֶם֙ לְצִדִּ֔ים <S%H6654><s%> you but they shall be [as thorns] in your sides וֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> and their gods יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become לָכֶ֖ם לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H4170><s%> shall be a snare

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּדַבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מַלְאַ֤ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And it came to pass when the angel יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> lifted up הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> that the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קוֹלָ֖ם <S%H6963><s%> their voice וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> and wept

וַֽיִּקְרְא֛וּ <S%H7121><s%> And they called שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֹּכִ֑ים <S%H1066><s%> Bochim וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <S%H2076><s%> and they sacrificed שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> there unto the LORD פ

וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> go יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> And when Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> had let the people וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <S%H1980><s%> went בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְנַחֲלָת֖וֹ <S%H5159><s%> unto his inheritance לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land

וַיַּעַבְד֤וּ <S%H5647><s%> served הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> all the days יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> of Joshua וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> and all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> and all the days הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <S%H2205><s%> of the elders אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הֶאֱרִ֤יכוּ <S%H748><s%> defer יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> the days אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after that יְהוֹשׁ֔וּעַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who רָא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> who had seen אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> works יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> all the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> that he did לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> for Israel

וַיָּ֛מָת <S%H4191><s%> died יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֖וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> [being] an hundred וָעֶ֖שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> and ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיִּקְבְּר֤וּ <S%H6912><s%> And they buried אוֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> him in the border נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> of his inheritance בְּתִמְנַת־ חֶ֖רֶס <S%H8556><s%> in Timnathheres בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim מִצְּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> on the north side לְהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> of the hill גָּֽעַשׁ׃ <S%H1608><s%> Gaash

וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> also כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַדּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> And also all that generation הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נֶאֶסְפ֖וּ <S%H622><s%> were gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבוֹתָ֑יו <S%H1><s%> unto their fathers וַיָּקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> and there arose דּ֨וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation אַחֵ֜ר <S%H312><s%> another אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H310><s%> after אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> them which knew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> not the LORD וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> nor אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H4639><s%> nor yet the works אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> which he had done לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> for Israel ס

וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <S%H6213><s%> did בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <S%H1168><s%> Baalim

וַיַּעַזְב֞וּ <S%H5800><s%> And they forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבוֹתָ֗ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers הַמּוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> which brought them out אוֹתָם֮ <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיֵּלְכ֞וּ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֵ֣י ׀ <S%H310><s%> after that אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֗ים <S%H312><s%> other מֵאֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> of the gods הָֽעַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who סְבִיב֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> that [were] round about וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> them and bowed לָהֶ֑ם וַיַּכְעִ֖סוּ <S%H3707><s%> to anger אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> themselves unto them and provoked the LORD

וַיַּעַזְב֖וּ <S%H5800><s%> And they forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> and served לַבַּ֖עַל <S%H1168><s%> Baal וְלָעַשְׁתָּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H6252><s%> and Ashtaroth

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was hot אַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> And the anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַֽיִּתְּנֵם֙ <S%H5414><s%> and he delivered בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hands שֹׁסִ֔ים <S%H8154><s%> of spoilers וַיָּשֹׁ֖סּוּ <S%H8155><s%> that spoiled אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵ֞ם <S%H4376><s%> them and he sold בְּיַ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> them into the hands אֽוֹיְבֵיהֶם֙ <S%H341><s%> of their enemies מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָכְל֣וּ <S%H3201><s%> so that they could ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> not any longer לַעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> stand לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before אוֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H341><s%> their enemies

בְּכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they יָצְא֗וּ <S%H3318><s%> Whithersoever they went out יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> the hand יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> become בָּ֣ם לְרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> was against them for evil כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> had said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD וְכַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> had sworn יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and as the LORD לָהֶ֑ם וַיֵּ֥צֶר <S%H3334><s%> distressed לָהֶ֖ם מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> unto them and they were greatly

וַיָּ֥קֶם <S%H6965><s%> raised up יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Nevertheless the LORD שֹֽׁפְטִ֑ים <S%H8199><s%> judges וַיּ֣וֹשִׁיע֔וּם <S%H3467><s%> which delivered מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> them out of the hand שֹׁסֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8154><s%> of those that spoiled

וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Yet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שֹֽׁפְטֵיהֶם֙ <S%H8199><s%> unto their judges לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמֵ֔עוּ <S%H8085><s%> And yet they would not hearken כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for זָנ֗וּ <S%H2181><s%> but they went a whoring אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed לָהֶ֑ם סָ֣רוּ <S%H5493><s%> themselves unto them they turned מַהֵ֗ר <S%H4118><s%> quickly מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַדֶּ֜רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> out of the way אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הָלְכ֧וּ <S%H1980><s%> walked in אֲבוֹתָ֛ם <S%H1><s%> which their fathers לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> obeying מִצְוֹת־ <S%H4687><s%> the commandments יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not עָ֥שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> [but] they did כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> after that

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When הֵקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> raised יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> And when the LORD לָהֶם֮ שֹֽׁפְטִים֒ <S%H8199><s%> them up judges וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> then the LORD עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> was with הַשֹּׁפֵ֔ט <S%H8199><s%> was with the judge וְהֽוֹשִׁיעָם֙ <S%H3467><s%> and delivered מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> them out of the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H341><s%> of their enemies כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> all the days הַשּׁוֹפֵ֑ט <S%H8199><s%> of the judge כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִנָּחֵ֤ם <S%H5162><s%> for it repented יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִנַּֽאֲקָתָ֔ם <S%H5009><s%> of their groanings מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> because לֹחֲצֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3905><s%> by reason of them that oppressed וְדֹחֲקֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1766><s%> them and vexed

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בְּמ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> crying הַשּׁוֹפֵ֗ט <S%H8199><s%> And it came to pass when the judge יָשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> [that] they returned וְהִשְׁחִ֣יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> and corrupted מֵֽאֲבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> [themselves] more than their fathers לָלֶ֗כֶת <S%H1980><s%> along אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after that אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other לְעָבְדָ֖ם <S%H5647><s%> to serve וּלְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <S%H7812><s%> them and to bow down לָהֶ֑ם לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִפִּ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> unto them they ceased מִמַּ֣עַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4611><s%> not from their own doings וּמִדַּרְכָּ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> way הַקָּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7186><s%> nor from their stubborn

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was hot אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> And the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said יַעַן֩ <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עָבְר֜וּ <S%H5674><s%> hath transgressed הַגּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Because that this people הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִי֙ <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֣יתִי <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> their fathers וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> and have not hearkened לְקוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> unto my voice

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will no אוֹסִ֔יף <S%H3254><s%> I also will not henceforth לְהוֹרִ֥ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> drive out אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> any מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> from before מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> them of the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָזַ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> left יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> which Joshua וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> when he died

לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> order נַסּ֥וֹת <S%H5254><s%> That through them I may prove בָּ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel הֲשֹׁמְרִ֣ים <S%H8104><s%> whether they will keep הֵם֩ <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דֶּ֨רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk בָּ֗ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after שָׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> did keep אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> therein as their fathers אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or לֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> not

וַיַּנַּ֤ח <S%H3240><s%> left יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Therefore the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> those nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> those לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> without הוֹרִישָׁ֖ם <S%H3423><s%> driving them out מַהֵ֑ר <S%H4118><s%> hastily וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not נְתָנָ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> neither delivered בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> he them into the hand יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <S%H3091><s%> of Joshua פ
